summary: An FBI Miami letter to the Bureau of Prisons Office of General Counsel requesting information on two inmates as part of an ongoing investigation. The request seeks custody details, facility assignments, and release/death dates for the individuals.

persons.name: BERRY LESTER KESSLER
persons.context: Listed as a deceased inmate for whom the FBI is requesting custody and facility information as part of an ongoing investigation.

events.title: FBI Information Request to BOP
events.description: FBI Miami sends a formal request to the Bureau of Prisons Office of General Counsel seeking detailed custody information on two inmates.

keyFacts: The FBI Miami field office was conducting an ongoing investigation as of October 26, 2010, requiring information from the Bureau of Prisons.
The request specifically sought information on two inmates: one with BOP number 35601-054 (name redacted) and Berry Lester Kessler (BOP number 61264-061).
Berry Lester Kessler was believed to be deceased at the time of the request.
The FBI requested comprehensive custody details including dates in custody, all facility assignments, projected release date, and date of death if applicable.
The document indicates coordination between federal agencies (FBI and BOP) for investigative purposes.
